name: Miscellaneous Comic Knowledge! Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which person listed here was never known as Union Jack?
questions.explanation:
Brian Braddock.

	Brian Braddock is the older twin brother of Elizabeth (later, Psylocke) and younger sibling to elder brother, Jaime. Unknown to his children, their father was actually a native to the other-dimensional Otherworld and agent of its ruler, Merlin. Their father created an elaborate organic computer beneath their mansion, calling it Mastermind, to monitor their children in hopes that one of them would become this dimension's version of the hero Captain Britain.Montgomery Falsworth grew up to become a British nobleman. After situations still not fully revealed, Falsworth became a government operative (okay, "spy") during the first World War. His superiors decided to create a guise that would strike terror in enemy hearts as well as rally troops-- by having Falsworth appear as a personification of the British national flag.Brian Falsworth shared a cell with a German scientist who tried to recreate the super-soldier formula that created the hero Captain America, but would not let his experiment fall into Nazi hands. Instead, he gave the only sample to Falsworth, who drank the solution and became physically enhanced. Joseph Chapman was born of a more lower class parentage in London. Chapman, an art student, became involved with the original Union Jack's plan to team up with Captain America to defeat the vampire Baron Blood. With Falsworth's sudden death, it was up to Chapman to pose as Union Jack.

questions.text: Jackson Arvad is the secret identity of which Spiderman villian?
questions.explanation:
Will O' The Wisp.

	Jackson Arvad, the chief scientist for electromagnetic research at the Brand Corporation, was turned into the energy being called Will O' the Wisp during an accident at his laboratory. After escaping from the lab, where his employer, James Melvin, left him to die, he contacted Dr. Jonas Harrow, in order to be cured of his deteriorating condition. Harrow, implanted a receptor onto his skull, which on the surface would allow Wisp to maintain his physical integrity, but really would allow Harrow to control the energy being.

questions.text: What is the name of the ancient spirit that Marc Spector came in contact with that granted him the powers of the Moon Knight?
questions.explanation:
The Spirit of Khonshu.

	Spector began having vivid dreams that Khonshu was summoning him. These proving to be irresistible, he boarded a flight to Egypt to investigate their significance. Three priests of Khonshu told him that being Moon Knight was his destiny. Not able to help himself, he donned the new Moon Knight costume they had for him and accepted their new weapons.The priests, who claimed to be unable to leave the tomb, assigned him the task of returning to them the statue of Khonshu, which he had sold. In the process, he encountered his counterpart, the champion of Anubis, the jackal-headed death god, and defeated him.Since returning the statue to them, he acted as the agent of the priests of Khonshu, traveling the world at their bidding to battle the forces of evil.

questions.text: In the comic book "the Authority", the team appeared to be killed off by a government created monster named Seth. When the team returned what was the punishment they decided on for their would be killer?
questions.correct: They turned him into a chicken then let his hillbilly family eat him.
options: They turned him into stone and left him in the Arctic.
They let Midnighter rip him to pieces.
They opened a door to the sun and catapulted Seth into it.
questions.explanation:
They turned him into a chicken then let his hillbilly family eat him.

	Seth was the creation of the World's governments to enforce their will when they thought their power was threatened.

questions.text: In the Darkness/Batman crossover, Darkness wanted to find out what Batman feared most. Who did Darkness query?
questions.explanation:
Joker.

	When Darkness went to Arkham to ask the Joker what Batman's greatest fear was he responded by telling him a joke that made no sense. When Darkness questioned him about the jokes meaning, Joker responded "You're the one who asked the silly question and when you ask a silly question."

Master Mold.

	Bolivar Trask was a scientist whose greatest creations were the mutant-hunting giant robots known as Sentinels. In every wave of Sentinels there is one Master Mold, the central intelligence for all the drones that are created. Master Mold is itself a giant Sentinel, responsible for much of the artificial intelligence decisions made by the entire body of Sentinel robots. After the robots were first sent to capture the mutant heroes known as the X-Men, the first Master Mold ultimately rebelled against its creator and killed Trask.

questions.text: When the Thunder God Thor apparently went insane whom did the Silver Surfer contact in order to help stop the God's rampage? He was successful where the Surfer, The Infinity Watch, Doctor Strange, and other Asgardian Gods were not.
questions.explanation:
Thanos.

	This conflict led the assembled group to Asgard, where they came into contact with Odin. Thanos battled Odin until the God learned the truth, he revived Thor, and allowed Thanos and the heroes to leave Asgard with his and Thor's gratitude.

questions.text: Which of the following abilities does Harley Quinn not possess?
questions.explanation:
She can read minds.

	All of the powers Harley has were given to her due to Poison Ivy's anti-toxin.

questions.text: In the comic "The Big O", Roger Smith's number one nemisis shares a name with what popular singer?
questions.explanation:
Beck.

	Roger Smith is always fighting an arms dealer, with a major Superman curl, named Beck.
